functional.translation[0].definitions[0]: designed to be useful rather than beautiful or attractive
buildings that are sensitively designed, not purely functional
functional.translation[0].definitions[1]: something that is functional is working correctly
By 2004, the Supertram is expected to be fully functional.
functional.translation[0].definitions[2]: relating to the purpose of something
The two departments have slight functional differences.
functional.translation[1].definitions[0]: connected with the purpose for which something is made or used, or with the job that someone does
Three key functional areas of management are marketing, production and personnel management.
The project manager is responsible for ensuring that time and money are properly budgeted between functional departments.
functional.translation[1].definitions[1]: designed to be useful rather than beautiful or decorative
We now have premises which are both smart and functional.
functional.translation[1].definitions[2]: working in a way that something is supposed to
Intel is sending fully functional samples of the chips for shipment to manufacturers.
